languages.text: "Славно молвишь! Колдун падет, ибо иначе быть не может". {n}Торбальд одобрительно кивает, не подозревая, что обращались вы вовсе не к нему.{/n}
"A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Славно молвишь! Колдун падет, ибо иначе быть не может". {n}Торбальд одобрительно кивает, не подозревая, что обращались вы вовсе не к нему.{/n}

languages.text: “说得好！那个巫师必死无疑，因为他没有不死的理由。”{n}索巴德点着头，表示赞同，但却根本没有意识到你并没有在和他说话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “说得好！那个巫师必死无疑，因为他没有不死的理由。”{n}索巴德点着头，表示赞同，但却根本没有意识到你并没有在和他说话。{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist gut, das zu hören! Der Hexer wird fallen, denn er muss fallen." {n}Thorbald nickt zustimmend, nicht ahnend, dass du gar nicht mit ihm gesprochen hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist gut, das zu hören! Der Hexer wird fallen, denn er muss fallen." {n}Thorbald nickt zustimmend, nicht ahnend, dass du gar nicht mit ihm gesprochen hast.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Me alegra oír eso! El hechicero caerá, pues no puede ser de otro modo». {n}Thorbald asiente con la cabeza, sin darse cuenta de que no estabas hablando con él.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Me alegra oír eso! El hechicero caerá, pues no puede ser de otro modo». {n}Thorbald asiente con la cabeza, sin darse cuenta de que no estabas hablando con él.{/n}

languages.text: « Ravi de l'entendre ! Le sorcier mourra, c'est inévitable. » {n}Thorbald vous signifie son approbation d'un signe de la tête, sans se rendre compte que votre réponse ne lui était pas adressée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ravi de l'entendre ! Le sorcier mourra, c'est inévitable. » {n}Thorbald vous signifie son approbation d'un signe de la tête, sans se rendre compte que votre réponse ne lui était pas adressée.{/n}

languages.text: 「いいことを聞いた！ソーサラーは落ちる、何しろもうそれかしかないのだから」{n}トールバルドは、あなたが話していた相手が彼であったことに全く気づかず、賞賛を表した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいことを聞いた！ソーサラーは落ちる、何しろもうそれかしかないのだから」{n}トールバルドは、あなたが話していた相手が彼であったことに全く気づかず、賞賛を表した。{/n}

languages.text: "İşte bunu duymak istiyorum! Sahir düşecek zira ölmekten başka seçeneği yok." {n}Ona değil de bir başkasına cevap verdiğini fark etmeyen Thorbald, onaylarcasına başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A fine thing to hear! The sorcerer will fall, for he can't but fall." {n}Thorbald nods his approval, unaware that he wasn't at all who you were talking to.{/n}
